.comment-us__wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #eae8e3;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-us__wrapper {
      padding-top: 4px;
      padding-left: 20px;
      padding-right: 20px; } }

/* Content and Type */
.comment-us__content, .comment-us__article {

  @media all and (min-width: 71.25em) {
    .comment-us__content, .comment-us__article {
      height: 230px; } }

.comment-us__title {
  color: #ffffff;
  font-size: 20px;
  line-height: 24px;
  font-weight: 500; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {

      line-height: 30px;
      font-weight: 200;

  @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {

  @media all and (min-width: 71.25em) {

      line-height: 24px; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 71.25em) {

@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {

.comment-us__article, .comment-us__link--mobile {
